about_the_game:
Welcome to Jelly Farm, where farm fun gets a sweet twist! Embark on a colorful and addictive adventure as you run a unique farm where everything is made of food. Plant vibrant crops and harvest resources to create unique treats that will make your farm shine.

(explore and cultivate)

Jelly Farm is the perfect place to relax, have fun and discover your inner jelly farmer! Get ready to build your own dream farm and reap the rewards of a lifetime of fun.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Jelly Farm, where farm fun gets a sweet twist! Embark on a colorful and addictive adventure as you run a unique farm where everything is made of food. Plant vibrant crops and harvest resources to create unique treats that will make your farm shine.

(explore and cultivate)

Jelly Farm is the perfect place to relax, have fun and discover your inner jelly farmer! Get ready to build your own dream farm and reap the rewards of a lifetime of fun.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu >= 20.04, Arch, or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: For 720p: Radeon R9 270, GeForce GTX 670 (Kepler architecture, driver 472.12+), Intel Iris Xe, or similar (with 2+ GB of VRAM)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: You may need to disable Steam controls for better gameplay.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu >= 20.04, Arch, or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: For 720p: Radeon R9 270, GeForce GTX 670 (Kepler architecture, driver 472.12+), Intel Iris Xe, or similar (with 2+ GB of VRAM)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: You may need to disable Steam controls for better gameplay.

name: Jelly Farm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: For 720p: Radeon R9 270, GeForce GTX 670 (Kepler architecture, driver 472.12+), Intel Iris Xe, or similar (with 2+ GB of VRAM)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, please
  • Additional Notes: You may need to disable Steam controls for better gameplay.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: For 720p: Radeon R9 270, GeForce GTX 670 (Kepler architecture, driver 472.12+), Intel Iris Xe, or similar (with 2+ GB of VRAM)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: You may need to disable Steam controls for better gameplay.

short_description: Jelly Farm is a charming farming game where you grow and collect jelly and food! As the new farmer in the valley, your mission is to transform a small and simple farm into a true jelly paradise.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
